data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Gironde, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gironde, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Gironde, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary: On average, 199 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Gironde, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 17,990 believers living in the county of Gironde. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Gironde. Through your servants plant 292 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Iu Mien people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Gironde, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Gironde to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 17,990 believers in Gironde and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
